actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Subcommittee on Taxation and Debt Management took the following actions.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.
Subcommittee on Taxation and Debt Management. Hearings held.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Taxation and Debt Management

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude certain service performed on fishing boats from coverage for purposes of unemployment compensation.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from unemployment taxation commercial fishermen who, pursuant to an arrangement with the owner or operator of a fishing boat, receive a share of the boat's catch or proceeds from the sale thereof in lieu of cash remuneration. Specifies that the boat's crew must be comprised of fewer than ten individuals.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude certain service performed on fishing boats from coverage for purposes of unemployment compensation.
